title: Level 6 Associate
bullets: Why is this still on my resume? Good question!
This job taught me everything I know about how to operate in a highly-systematized environment
It was excellent for honing a strong work ethic and communication skills
I learned how to handle tough situations with grace when the customer *definitely wasn't* always right
Their rigorous + formulated cooking patterns inadvertently prepped my brain to learn how to code
People seem to like this fact about me because I wore a silly uniform for many years
The food is dope (Shake Shack is good too, I'm not trying to start a burger culture war)
